Prohibition Against Altering Signed Rating Decisions
Do
not
alter any rating decision that has been signed and submitted for promulgation.Â  When a rating decision requires correction prior to promulgation, follow the procedures outlined in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, 1.E.3
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D - Finalizing the Rating Decision
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D
